padtest.material package

Submodules

padtest.material.plate module

class padtest.material.plate.PlateMaterial[source]

Bases: object

Interface that creates a plate material in Plaxis from the contents of a dictionary.

classmethod concrete(fc, gamma, d, young_modulus=None, poisson=0.4)[source]

Creates a dictionary with the required plate properties based on the concrete type.

Parameters:

  • fc (float) – Design compressive strenght of concrete [MPa].

  • gamma (float) – Unit weight [kN/m3].

  • d (float) – Thickness of the slab [m].

  • young_modulus (float, optional) – Young modulus [kPa], by default None.

  • poisson (float, optional) – Poisson coeffcient, by default 0.4.

Returns:

Dictionary with the properties required to create a plate material.

Return type:

dict

classmethod set(g_i, label, material)[source]

Creates an elastic plate material in the model.

Parameters:

  • g_i (PlxProxyGlobalObject) – Global object of the current open Plaxis model in Input.

  • label (str) – Material label.

  • material (dict) – Dictionary with material properties

Returns:

Plaxis object of the plate material.

Return type:

CombinedClass

padtest.material.soil module

class padtest.material.soil.SoilMaterial[source]

Bases: object

Interface that creates a soil material in Plaxis from the contents of a dictionary.

classmethod set(g_i, label, material)[source]

Create soil materials in the model.

Parameters:

  • g_i (PlxProxyGlobalObject) – Global object of the current open Plaxis model in Input.

  • label (str) – Material label.

  • material (dict) – Dictionary with material properties

Returns:

Plaxis object of the soil material.

Return type:

CombinedClass

Raises:

RuntimeError – Unsuported soil model.
